subject: Requesting Update on Order SSN4426
description_text:
Hi Simson,


Iâ€™m reaching out to request an update on my order SSN4426. The delivery has
taken much longer than expected, and the communication throughout this
process has been very poor.


I would appreciate a clear update on when my order will arrive. Your
customer service and support team need to be more responsive, as this
experience has been frustrating.


Please get back to me as soon as possible with the status and estimated
delivery date.


Thank you.


Best regards,

Adrina Alvarez

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrina Alvarez,    I'm terribly sorry for the delay in responding. Here is your parcel tracking information.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047131099621
